# Composite Name Format

**API Collection**

These constants identify the format to use for a person’s composite name order for person records.

## Overview

See [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/ABPersonCompositeNameFormat] and [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/ABRecordCopyCompositeName(_:)].

## Constants

- **kABPersonCompositeNameFormatFirstNameFirst**: First name first.
- **kABPersonCompositeNameFormatLastNameFirst**: Last name first.

## Miscellaneous

- **Record Property Types**: These constants identify record property types.
- **Record Types**: These constants identify record types.
- **Sort Order**: These constants identify sort order for person lists.
- **Source Types**: These constants identify the type of a source.
